meanings.sent1: She was constricting the balloon by squeezing it tightly.
meanings.sent2: The snake was constricting its prey before swallowing it whole.
meanings.sent3: The constricting hug from her friend made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: His fear was constricting his ability to think clearly.
meanings.sent5: The constricting grip of anxiety was suffocating her.

meanings.sent1: The new rules were constricting our freedom to choose.
meanings.sent2: The tight deadline was constricting our ability to innovate.
meanings.sent3: The constricting budget forced us to get creative with our spending.
meanings.sent4: Her overprotective nature was constricting his independence.
meanings.sent5: The constricting regulations made it hard for small businesses to thrive.

meanings.sent1: He was constricting his muscles to lift the heavy weight.
meanings.sent2: The constricting feeling in his chest made him gasp for air.
meanings.sent3: The constricting grip of the vice made it hard to open the jar.
meanings.sent4: The constricting pain in his leg made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent5: The constricting sensation in her throat made her swallow hard.

meanings.sent1: The constricting pants were uncomfortable to wear.
meanings.sent2: The constricting ropes prevented her from escaping.
meanings.sent3: The constricting seatbelt felt like a hug from a robot.
meanings.sent4: The constricting crowd made it hard to move through the room.
meanings.sent5: The constricting bandage helped support his injured arm.
